title: Chicken and Vegetable Rice Bowl
steps: Cook rice according to package directions.
Dice chicken breast and season with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through.
Remove chicken from skillet and set aside.
Dice onion, bell pepper, and tomatoes. Mince garlic.
Add onion and bell pepper to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and tomatoes and cook for another 2 minutes.
Add chicken broth and soy sauce to the skillet and bring to a simmer.
Return chicken to the skillet and stir to combine.
Serve over rice.
notes: For a spicier dish, add a pinch of red pepper flakes. Use brown rice for a healthier option.

title: Chicken, Tomato, and Bell Pepper Skillet
steps: Dice chicken breast and season with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add chicken and cook until browned and cooked through. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Dice onion and bell pepper. Mince garlic.
Add onion and bell pepper to the skillet and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute more.
Add diced tomatoes, oregano, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Return chicken to the skillet and heat through.
Serve with rice.
notes: Serve over rice or pasta. Garnish with fresh parsley.

title: Simple Chicken and Rice Soup
steps: Dice chicken breast.
Dice onion. Mince garlic.
Heat olive oil (optional) in a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat.
Add onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
Add chicken broth, diced tomatoes, rice, chicken and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30 minutes, or until rice is cooked.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
notes: Remove bay leaf before serving. Add other vegetables like carrots and celery for added nutrients.
